== Introduction ==

It would be great to have '''precise and accurate''' <nowiki>[[Testing-TestCaseFormat|manual test definitions]]</nowiki> for the following packages. 

To sign up for a package, just add `@``SIG``@` behind the package name. These tests will be considered for automation as we increase our testing velocity.

Good examples might be the <nowiki>[[http://packages.qa.ubuntu.com/qatracker/testcases/1393/info|unity test cases]]</nowiki> and the <nowiki>[[http://packages.qa.ubuntu.com/qatracker/testcases/1333/info|Online Account Shotwell test cases]]</nowiki>.
